EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - Creating 21st Century Science Infrastructure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Creating 21st Century Science Infrastructure – are we doing enough?
We recently sent you an invitation to join us at our open discussion to review the UK Government's science capital roadmap – and to ask whether the UK is investing enough in science to retain its place as a world-class destination for scientific research.
We don't appear to have heard from you, but hope you can join us.
Programme:
5.30pm Registration and refreshments 6.00pm Panel discussion 7.00pm-8.00pm Drinks and canapés
Confirmed Speakers:
Chair: Steve Bates, CEO, BioIndustry Association Dr Kieron Flanagan, Senior Lecturer in Science and Technology Policy at Manchester Business School and a member of the Manchester Institute of Innovation Research David Parfrey, Executive Director, Finance & Campus Operations, BBSRC Dr Martino Picardo, CEO, Stevenage BioScience Catalyst
Introduction by Mark Halstead, Head of Science + Innovation, AECOM
Read more about our See Further series
On: 11 December 2014 5.30pm-8.00pm
At: AECOM MidCity Place 71 High Holborn London WC1V 6QS
